summary: This new code file introduces a slider functionality in the system. It contains logic to display a series of slides (posters) on the screen, with the ability to navigate through them using buttons or automatic sliding. The file defines functions for initializing the slider, showing the next and previous slides, as well as stopping the automatic sliding when manual navigation is triggered. Additionally, it sets up event listeners for interacting with a menu icon. This file enhances the system by providing an interactive slideshow feature.
